definition: tail/remainder/remnant/extremity/sixth of the 28 constellations/classifier for fish
horse's tail/pointed posterior section of a locust etc
to inject/to pour into/to concentrate/to pay attention/stake (gambling)/classifier for sums of money/variant of 註|注[zhu4]

sentences.english: Type the footnote or endnote content in this area.
sentences.chinese: 在这一区域键入脚注或尾注的内容。

sentences.english: Footnotes or endnotes must start at 1 if numbering is not continuous.
sentences.chinese: 如果编号不连续，则脚注或尾注必须从1开始。

sentences.english: The professor is adding endnotes to this difficult paragraph.
sentences.chinese: 教授正在为这段难懂的文字添加尾注。

sentences.english: Represents the properties assigned to a range or selection of endnotes in a document.
sentences.chinese: 代表分配给一个范围或尾注中选择一个文件的属性。

sentences.english: You can only insert footnotes or endnotes into the first frameset.
sentences.chinese: 您只能在第一个框架集中插入脚注或尾注。

sentences.english: If Selection. Footnotes. Count > 0 Then Selection. Footnotes. Convert.
sentences.chinese: 本示例将选定内容的脚注转换为尾注。

definition: tab window (in a web browser etc)/paging/pagination/page break (computing)
Chinese underdot (punct. used for emphasis, sim. to Western italics)
